dialogue.text: What the hell?! What is this place?!
I hate that it has come to this, we are in what's called a liminal space.
We took too long to send them back, hence the reality pulling us in.
Well what do we do now!? Where are the kids!?
Thankfully I was able to close the tear that pulled us in, they are safe in the Sanctum Sanctorum.
Let's be careful, I don't think we are the only ones this tear pulled in.
*Spidey's senses went off, and Strange sensed a magical disturbance nearby*
MWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA, Look who it is! The child and his father! Oh wait, You don't have one!!!
I'm no father, and I will kindly ask you to FUCK OFF. Peter, I need you to cooperate for once.
Distract these eccentric fellas while I try to fix YOUR mess.
Nuh uh, this isn't my mess. I ain't admitting nothing.
I am not in the mood for your tomfoolery right now. Peter, if someone dies during this their blood will be on your hands.
Alright then, I'll deal with this old man.
*Strange goes to the back and begins casting his spell, when suddenly the rest of the villains appear*
Oh so the child has bitten more than he can chew. Prepare for the beatdown of a lifetime.
We will make you wish you never got bit by that Spider, PETER!
and no blue hair kid and his pathetic excuse of a girlfriend by your side? This will be a piece of cake!
When will you learn that everything that's happened is because of you.
What a pathetic excuse of a hero.
We wasted our time bonding with you, Parker.
You're gonna see what "Sparkles" feel like.
That... wasn't as intimidating as the others.. but
Bring it on!
